name: World Collapse
description:
World collapse is an action-rpg where you play as a member of the resistance in a world ruled by a single organization.

The resistance objective is to free the world from the organization.

The game is currently on development

Features (current version)

- Pixel graphics

- 5 randomly generated levels, each with its own events and bosses

- Inventory and equipment system

- map

- Around 30 different items

Currently working on:

- skill system (well the system is done but not enough skills to make it worth including in the current version)

- vendors (also done but i want to make a city or peace zone to put these kind of things)

- improving map generation

- history continuation!

here is a gameplay video by Azrokaiyax Incorporated

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3qPBu9MGkOI

If you find any bugs, exploits, or just want to give some feedback, you can leave a comment on http://gamejolt.com/games/action/world-collapse/74...

Thats all i guess, go start killing the resistances enemies and grab some loot in the way!
